Eclipse helios:http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/packages/eclipse-ide-java-ee-developers/heliossr1</br>
Maven 2..2.1 :http://maven.apache.org/download.html</br>


1.安装 maven的插件：The Maven Integration for Eclipse </br>
Maven插件更新地址：http://m2eclipse.sonatype.org/sites/m2e（详细安装步骤也见此页面）</br>
2.Window->Preferences->Maven->installations->Add 把maven的路径添加上</br>
3.用SVN把项目迁出http://b3log-solo.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/</br>
4.更新gae相关资源。右键项目，run as maven build... --> Goals: gae:unpack</br>
5.运行项目。右键项目，run as maven build... --> Goals: gae:run</br>
6.部署项目，run as maven build... --> Goals: gae:deploy</br>
